verses.roman:
śrīrāma paṇḍita āra paṇḍita dāmodara
śrīmān paṇḍita, āra vijaya, śrīdhara

synonyms: śrī-rāma paṇḍita—Śrīrāma Paṇḍita; āra—and; paṇḍita dāmodara—Dāmodara Paṇḍita; śrīmān paṇḍita—Śrīmān Paṇḍita; āra—and; vijaya—Vijaya; śrīdhara—Śrīdhara.
translation: Śrīrāma Paṇḍita, Dāmodara Paṇḍita, Śrīmān Paṇḍita, Vijaya and Śrīdhara were also very much pleased to hear it.
